snippet.textDisplay:
Wow such nostalgia in this track.

snippet.textDisplay:
There's definitely similarities but FE wishes it could have the world building and political intrigue the ogre series has. 

It's what elitists pretend the old FE games were.

snippet.textDisplay: Ogre Battle 64 is an excellent game! If you like Final Fantasy Tactics, TacticsOgre, the original Ogre Battle, Fire Emblem, Disciples, or even Shining Force or Vandal Hearts, you will enjoy this game. It is one of the best games on the 64.
snippet.textOriginal: Ogre Battle 64 is an excellent game! If you like Final Fantasy Tactics, TacticsOgre, the original Ogre Battle, Fire Emblem, Disciples, or even Shining Force or Vandal Hearts, you will enjoy this game. It is one of the best games on the 64.

snippet.textDisplay: Cartridges got something special that CDs don't have. I can't really describe it, but it's something with the fact that they were only for games, CDs goes for music and a lot of other things. Cartridges give me nostalgia of the golden days where you rented them. I'm glad nintendo didn't turn to CD with n64 just to stick to the coreography.
snippet.textOriginal: Cartridges got something special that CDs don't have. I can't really describe it, but it's something with the fact that they were only for games, CDs goes for music and a lot of other things. Cartridges give me nostalgia of the golden days where you rented them. I'm glad nintendo didn't turn to CD with n64 just to stick to the coreography.
